name: Mind & Body [Demo]
description:
You are a wandering soul, lost in a graveyard deep within a gloomy dim-lit forest. You must find your final resting place, through whatever means necessary. Possess the bodies of other creatures, acquire powerful abilities, and defeat other wandering souls to increase your odds of survival.

This demo includes the first full level of the game along with the first three unlockable abilities, three corresponding perks, as well as a powerful foe that can be possessed upon its defeat.

This is our first venture into game development so we hope you enjoy, and thank you for checking out our page!
